guidance.title: What to do when INVALID
guidance.details:
Usualy it is needed to power cycle the Modbus Gateway:
WAVESHARE RS485 TO POE ETH (B)
The gateway in FREIA is located in the FREIA compressor room on the wall behind the 2K pumps.
For the gateway in Hus3 contact Bj√∂rn Kuzavas tel. 070-1679246
